messages.title: Our pledges for flourishing communities
messages.content: Protection for the post offices and pubs on which communities depend.

messages.title: Britain in the world a safer, fairer world
messages.content: Labour's Global Future, the benefits of a common defence policy, the idea that Britain will be safer and our interests better protected in a tough world if we work closely with our key partners in Europe and across the Atlantic.

messages.title: Our pledges for a safer and fairer world
messages.content: Labour's global future- benefits of cooperation on crime, terrorism, and global instability.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protection for the post offices and pubs on which communities depend.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Commitment to a Strategic Defence Review
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commit a Strategic Defence Review to equip our Armed Forces for new global challenges.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet mentions Labour pledges for flourishing communities and a safer, fairer world, including benefits of cooperation on crime, terrorism, and global instability.
